resources.string:
--- Doha --- 

 Shri-guru charan saroj raj,
 Nij manu mukur sudhari |

 Barnau Raghubar bimal jasu,
 Jo dhayak phal chaari || 


Buddhiheen tanu jaanike,
 Sumiro Pavan kumar |

 Bal buddhi vidya dehu mohe,
 Harhu kalesh vikar ||


 Page-1

--- Chopai ---

 Jai Hanuman gyan gun sagar |
 Jai kapees tihu lok ujagar ||


Ramdoot atulit bal dhama |
 Anjani putr Pavan sut nama ||


Mahabir Bikram bajrangee |
 Kumati nivar Sumati ke sangi ||


Kanchan baran biraj subesa |
 Kanan kundal kunchit kesa ||
 


 Page-2

Haat vajr aur dhwaja biraje |
 Kandhe moonj janeu saje ||


Sankar suvan kesri nandan |
 Tej pratap maha jag bandhan ||


Vidhyavan guni ati chatur |
 Ram kaaj karibe ko aatur ||


Prabhu charitr sunibe ko rasiya |
 Ram Lakhan Sita man basiya ||


 Page-3

Sukshm roop dhari siyahi dhikhava |
Vikat roop dhari lank jarava ||

Bhim roop dhari asur sahare |
Ramchandra ke kaaj savare ||

 Laye Sanjeevan Lakhan jiyaye |
 Shri Raghuvir harshi ur laye ||

 Raghupati keenhi bahut badai |
 Tum mam priye Bharat-hi sam bhai || 


 Page-4

Sahas badan tumhro jas gavey |
As kahi shripati kant lagavey ||

Sankadik Bhramadhi munisa |
Narad sarad sahit ahisa ||

Jam Kuber digpal jaha thay |
Kavi Kobid kahi sake kaha te ||

Tum upkar Sughreev-hi keenhna |
Ram milaye raj pad deenha ||


 Page-5

Tumroh mantr Vibhishan maana |
Lankeshvar bhaye sab jag jaana ||

Jug sahstr jojan per bhanu |
Leelyo tahi madhur phal janu ||

Prabhu mudrika meli mukh mahi |
Jaldhi langhi gaye achraj nahi ||

Durgam kaaj jagat ke jete |
Sugam anugrah tumhre tete || 


 Page-6

Ram duaare tum rakhvare |
Hoat na aagya binu paisare ||

Sab sukh lahey tumhari sarna |
Tum rakshak kahu ko darna ||

Aapan tej samharo aapey |
Teeno lok haak te kaapey ||

Bhoot pisaach nikat nahi aavey |
Mahavir jab naam sunavey ||


 Page-7

Naase rog hare sab peera |
Japat nirantar Hanumat bira ||

Sankat se Hanuman chhudave |
Mann kram vachan dhyan jo lavey ||

Sab par Ram tapasvi raja |
Tin ke kaaj sakal tum saja ||

Aur manorath jo koyi lavey |
Soyi amit jeevan phal pavey || 


 Page-8

Charo jug prataap tumhara |
Hai prasiddh jagat ujiyara ||

Sadhu sant ke tum rakhvare |
Asur nikandan Ram dulare ||

Asht siddhi navnidhi ke data |
As bar deen Janaki mata ||

Ram rasayan tumhre pasa |
Sada raho Raghupati ke dasa || 


 Page-9

Tumhre bhajan Ram ko pavey |
Janam janam ke dukh bisravey ||

Ant kaal Raghubar pur jayi |
Jaha janam hari bhakt kahayi ||

Aur devta chitt na dharayi |
Hanumat seyi sarv sukh karayi ||

Sankat katey mitey sab peeda |
Jo sumere Hanumat balbira || 


 Page-10

Jai Jai Jai Hanuman gusai |
Kripa karo guru dev ke naai ||

Jo sat bar paath kar koyi |
Chhutehi bandhi maha sukh hoi ||

Jo yeh padhe Hanuman chalisa |
Hoye siddhi saki gaurisa ||

Tulsidas sada hari chera |
Kije nath hridaye meh dera || 


 Page-11

--- Doha ---

 Pavan tanaye sankat haran,
Mangal murti roop |
Ram Lakhan Sita sahit,
Hridaye basahu sur bhoop ||

 --- Iti --- 

 || Jai Shri Ram ||
 || Jai Shri Ram ||
 || Jai Shri Ram || 


 Page-12
Dotzoo is a USA based Smartphone and Web Solutions Development Company. You can reach us:
This digitized version of the Chalisa (Prayer) is commonly recited by Hindus globally in honor of Lord Hanuman - Hindu God representing Strength, Devotion and Perseverence!
It is believed that recital of Hanuman Chalisa, written by Tulsidas (1497/1532-1623) - a Hindu Poet-Saint, invokes divine intervention in dealing with grave problems and challenges.
Would you like to rate this app?
Sorry, there\'s no web browser available

Hi, I found this useful App to read and listen to the Hanuman Chalisa. It even comes with an Alram feature, so you can wake up to the sounds of the Conch (Shank) and Bells. And this App is completely FREE, with a great audio quality. \n
